The '''Courier's Longhouse''' is a collective of Couriers based in Natlan. Its base of operations is located in {{Location|"Scions of the Canopy"}}.

The agency consists of Couriers who will deliver items that are not extremely valuable, fragile, or dangerous<ref>{{Ref/BB|Couriers' Longhouse Bulletin Board|Hiring a Courier}}</ref>
